summary: After being raped in an unknown rooftop, nineteen year-old girl Poppo meets a mysterious boy, and both share their sexual traumas and fears, with fatal consequences.
cast: Mimi Kozakura|Michio Akiyama|Yôko Yamamoto|Hiroshi Imaizumi|Takeshi Kitano
keywords: black and white film with a color scene|suicidal|pinku eiga|softcore|rooftop
title: Yuke yuke nidome no shojo
